WorkItem.Description: Just noticed this item, both ilvl 158/145, are missing the proc.
WorkItem.Summary: [Items] Solace of the Fallen - Missing proc

Comments.Message: Missing the proc may mean the proc isn't valid for model, I know i've added parsing for that item recently. Which model is it not showing up for?
Probably referring to the Healadin module, as there are no procs for this item in said module.
You can quickly emulate its proc by Editting item and setting the MP5 value to 128 for nonheroic version, and 144 for heroic. I'll make sure this works more closely as intended in next version.

I checked this out further, and the model Supports it, but right now there are 2 other problems.
Importing from Armory gives it a proc from "Damaging Spells". The proc is really from "Helpful spells". Loading item from Armory, editing and changing from "DamageSpellCast" to "HealingSpellCast" will enable the trinket and correctly model it.
Loading from WowHead will fail entirely.
Should be fixed for next release. Leaving this open so other healing models can doublecheck that my proper implementation & parsing of the proc did not break theirs.
